Articles.Content:
The goal of this mission is to land a Kerbal (the same Kerbal) on all celestial bodies with a surface in as many SOIs as possible, and to recover the entire vehicle.

The use of ISRU, nuclear propulsion, ion propulsion, mod parts, reactionless drives, or cheats is prohibited for the mission. Although not for testing.

The scores range from 0 to 7.

1 point per SOI completed. A score of 7 is a Grand Tour ∞.

Assembling multiple craft in LKO is ok. But launching more craft after any leave LKO is not.

 

Splitting your craft up is fine. Just remember you need the Kerbal to land with it to count.

Edited September 8, 2019 by Pds314
